title: Kendall Jenner 'baby fever' questioned after declaring she wanted a baby
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kendall Jenner has sent fans into a spin with her admittance that she "can’t wait to have a kid," but it looks like plans are on hold.

The 23-year-old model revealed in the latest episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians that she wanted children sooner rather than later but it seems that desire has quickly worn off.

Sources close to the reality star have told Hollywood Life that Kendall "does not have baby fever," and has poured cold water on her followers' hope that she would soon be pregnant.

The source continued to say: "It’s still all very hypothetical for her.”

(Image: Getty Images)

It would seem that Kendall's statement to Kim Kardashian in their reality show was more of a thought for the future rather than an impulse she was looking to act upon any time soon.

The Kardashian insider continued: "When she said she can’t wait for that moment, it didn’t mean she’s planning to start a family anytime soon.

"She still has a lot she wants to accomplish with her modeling career. And, she still considers herself very young. She’s not interested in rushing things.”

It would seem that the small matter of having a loving and constant partner is one of the prerequisites of starting a family.

Kendall can be reasonably private about her dating life, so it would be a surprise if a father-in-waiting is revealed any time soon.

A second source told Hollywood Life the model "wants to eventually have a family, but she wants to be in a fully committed relationship to make it all happen."

(Image: Getty Images)

They went on to explain that Kendall was speculating about having a family, as she enjoys having these conversations with her sisters.

They went on to say: "She isn’t going to have a baby just to have one, but talking with her sisters about it is a way for them to relate to each other.”

Speaking in KUWTK, Kendall told Kim Kardashian: "I can’t wait to have a kid. I’m going to make him do the coolest things, so when he’s older, he’s just a stud."

(Image: Instagram)

Kendall's fans will be disappointed that it was just talk and the source confirmed: "It’s fun to talk about, but then reality sets in it’s a different story.

"So many other things have to fall into place. Saying it and rushing into it are two totally separate things all together.

"There will be no pregnancy announcements from Kendall anytime soon."

Presumably someone has told momager Kris Jenner, so that she doesn't start knitting some booties any time soon.

description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has tempered excitement that she could soon be pregnant by pouring cold water on the idea
